paper_abstract: In this paper, some existence theorems of nonzero solutions for a system of bilinear variational inequalities are proved by using the coincidence degree theory in reflexive Banach spaces. The results presented in this paper improve and extend some known results in the literature. (C) 2008 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Nonzero solutions for a system of variational inequalities in reflexive Banach spaces
